description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Surakarta, Indonesia. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Opulent Surakarta City Break with Semi-Outdoor Pool & Fine Dining
hotels.description: Experience the grandeur of Javanese culture at this contemporary gem, located in the heart of Surakarta, also known as Solo. This enchanting retreat boasts striking Javanese interiors paired with Batik motif nuances, just a stone's throw from popular attractions such as the Keraton Kasunanan Palace and the Triwindu Antique Market. Savour exquisite flavours at Srikandi restaurant, unwind by the lavish semi-outdoor pool, sip refreshing drinks at Tirtotedjo Pool Bar and rejuvenate your senses at the sauna. The hotel is also within easy reach of the city's famed Batik Village, where you can explore the intricate art of batik making. As night falls, indulge in the vibrant street food scene just steps from your door.

hotels.title: Central Java Retreat in Solo with Onsite Restaurant, Outdoor Pool & Spa
hotels.description: Make the most of your time in Java from this urban oasis in Surakarta (known as Solo to the locals) that offers phenomenal vistas of the glittering skyline. Stylish and central, Novotel Solo features a sparkling outdoor pool with cosy sun loungers, sleek rooms and suites, and an indulgent spa with indoor jacuzzi. Celebrate your escape with a drink in your hand at the Saraswati Bar, and delight your tastebuds with Javan and international delicacies at the Andrawina Restaurant. When it's time to explore, you'll find vibrant local markets, magnificent royal palaces and historical temples all just a short stroll away.
